name: nodejsproject
description: a scanfolder for a website usig typeScript as language; expressjs as server side framework;React as client side framework; Jasmine as UT engine; nodemon is debug tool; VsCode as IDE.

scripts.forever: node_modules/.bin/forever start -a -l forever.log -o out.log -e err.log -w --watchDirectory ./debug debug/app.js

author: Abe Ge
